ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.Activities

Class ExpenseActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.Activities.ExpenseActivity

  • public class ExpenseActivity
extends Activity
    This activity is used to manage claims for all users. You can view all claims you have permission to see, whether thats your own claims or submitted claims. From this activity you can also create, edit, and approve claims which are supported by corresponding fragments.

      Cancels the claim creation/editing and returns back to the viewing screen

      Opens the claim manager fragment sets the claim index to the corresponding position in the array adapter and tells the claim manager that it should edit, not create.
